1420-1700: The Crown of England for ROY

Back to Index

270000. The Crown of England

ROY — Not random

Conditions

  • Own Essex
  • Control Essex
  • The following must not occur:
    • England exists

Will happen within 30 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 30 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1700)

Description

Having defeated all remnants of the English state, and seizing London, there are many demands in our English holdings to restore the nation of England and restore it to greatness on the world stage. Already thousands of men have come forward, offering to be part of a new English army, should we decide to carry out the wishes of the masses. The choice is ours...

Actions

A. England is reborn with me

  • +200 victory points
  • Stability +3
  • Flag graphics set to default
  • Become England
  • +5000 infantry in Essex
  • +2000 cavalry in Essex
  • Northumberland will be considered a claim province
  • Cumberland will be considered a claim province
  • Yorkshire will be considered a claim province
  • Lancaster will be considered a claim province
  • Gloucester will be considered a claim province
  • Midlands will be considered a claim province
  • Derby will be considered a claim province
  • Lincoln will be considered a claim province
  • Oxford will be considered a claim province
  • East Anglia will be considered a claim province
  • Essex will be considered a claim province
  • Sussex will be considered a claim province
  • Wessex will be considered a claim province
  • Devon will be considered a claim province
  • Move capital to Essex
